Item ID19538

The zenyte ring is made by using a gold bar, a zenyte, and a ring mould on a furnace with a Crafting level of 89. Doing so gives the player 150 experience in Crafting.

Players can cast Lvl-7 Enchant on a zenyte ring to enchant it into a ring of suffering. This requires level 93 Magic and grants 110 Magic experience.
